name: Galactic Revolution
description:
You're stranded in enemy space with nothing but your wits and an experimental time-warp drive... can you take on the waves of enemies all on your own, and go face-to-face with the Admiral? 

Rotate your device to pilot your ship, and tap anywhere to slow down time and dodge enemy fire! Rack up points from defeating enemies to buy upgrades for your ship to become even deadlier!
